name: hirelens
description: AI-powered resume parsing and ATS scoring platform

scripts.build: cd packages/shared-types && npm run build && cd ../config && npm run build && cd ../../client && npm run build
scripts.start: cd client && npm run start & cd server && npm run start
scripts.install-deps: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd server && npm install
scripts.clean: cd client && npm run clean && cd server && npm run clean
scripts.vercel-build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd packages/shared-types && npm run build && cd ../config && npm run build && cd ../../client && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd packages/shared-types && npm run build && cd ../config && npm run build
